main.name: Manaf Asif
main.description: A glimpse into some of the work I've done and the skills I've gained along the way
main.bio: I love to knit. Not with yarn, but with the very threads of technology that propel humanity forward. Whether it be twisting machine learning with computer vision to develop advanced robots or intertwining PID algorithms with radionavigation to create UAVs, every experience was accompanied by the exhilaration of transforming a tangle of concepts into the lacework of a solution. It's a feeling that drove me to UT Austin, ready to explore the vast specializations and opportunities that lie in the field of CS while indulging myself in the hackathons and passion projects that define the UTCS experience.
main.contactmessage: Contact me through here or through my email as listed below!

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the skills I've developed over my CS career so far:

education.school: The University of Texas at Austin
education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science

work.company: Texas Association of Business: The Texas State Chamber
work.title: Business Systems Analyst
work.description:
Designed, implemented, and maintained dynamic website using JavaScript on Velo

Performed technical consultations and systems optimization, refining and optimizing business processes with technology

Collaborated directly with supervisors to research and implement solution for managing many concurrent events with hundreds of attendees per requirements, leading to an 80% reduction in event management time

work.title: Systems Analyst
work.description:
Worked with management to optimize workflow by implementing automated solutions to efficiently process thousands of clients, reducing client entry creation time by 60%

Applied technical skills in a dynamic consultant/support role, performing emergency tech repairs and data recovery

Designed automated form filling and mass package tracking tools using Python and Selenium WebDriver, reducing processing time by 95% and increasing data accuracy significantly

Managed database of hundreds of thousands of court exhibits and client records

Implemented scripts to automate and enforce formatting guidelines

work.title: Web Developer; Android Developer
work.description:
Consulted with clients to refine their visions into realistic and effective products while defining stages of development

Utilized tools such as ReactJS and Android Studio to develop applications, implementing client feedback at each stage

work.title: Project Manager
work.description:
Coordinated development of application designed to guide students through high school

Guided team during development of MVP using ReactJS and MongoDB

Incorporated “Career Counseling” program into their workflow and client management system

work.title: Founder
work.description:
Provided clients with computer/3D printing consultations and complete PC builds

Compiled parts, assembled hardware, and setup software for servers and PCs used in personal and commercial applications

Developed website (manafmachines.com)

work.title: Founder; Lead Web Developer
work.description:
Administered collection and refurbishment of computers for redistribution to underrepresented communities

Restored various electronics and installed custom lightweight operating systems to make old systems usable

Appointed as Lead Web Developer (hbsglobal.org)
